Disabling the rightbar

Written by: Mike Pirog
Updated 9 months ago

This works the same as the default theme sidebaropen in new window option.

---
title: Disabling the rightbar
description: Learn how to easily add a guide newsletter signup.
guide: true
rightbar: false
---
Suggest an edit to this page open in new window
